articles.author: Madhu Balaji
articles.title: Sensex, Nifty pare early gains on profit booking; HUL, Laurus Labs, Colgate shares decline, Hindalco lead gainers
articles.description: Benchmark indices declined on Friday as investors engaged in profit-taking after a six-day rally fueled by optimism over easing global trade tensions between India and the US, and a possible recovery in domestic corporate earnings.
